resources.string: The ability for sub classes to utilise methods and attributes from their superclass refers to which principle in OOP?
Abstract classes can be used through which keyword in Java? (case sensitive)
Given the super class User and sub class Student, how would you instantiate an object User with the Student constructor? \n (use variable name "variable")
Which keyword is used to denote an abstract class in Java? (case sensitive)
____________ refers to the process of restricting access to data fields of a class using keyword "private"
Method ____________ refers to the defining multiple methods with the same name in a class.
A ____________ is a class that is derided from another class.
An ____________ is an instance of a class.
